classmethod update_profile(cls, *_, **kwargs)

The update_profile function updates the profile of a user. It takes in a username and updates their profile with the given information.

Parameters

  • cls – Used to Refer to the class itself, so that we can call methods of the class.

  • *_ –

    Used to Catch all the positional arguments that are passed to the function.

  • **kwargs –

    Used to Pass a variable-length list of keyword arguments to a function.

Returns

The profile object that is created by the get_or_create function.

classmethod get_user_profile(cls, user_id: sqlalchemy.dialects.postgresql.UUID)

The get_user_profile function returns a user’s profile.

Parameters

  • cls – Used to Make it possible to call the method from either user or profile.

  • user_id:UUID – Used to Pass in the user_id as a parameter to the function.

Returns

A dictionary.
